description:
Do you want your own E-learning site?

Do you want to be able to accept payments online using your own site?

Do you want to know the basics behind theme customization?

Here is what you will learn:

  • How to setup Wordpress.
  • How to add videos and pictures to Wordpress.
  • Add courses to Wordpress and accepting payments from Paypal.
  • Learn how to use online photo and design software.

Main benefits are:

  • Being able to create your own.
  • Accept payments on your own website.
  • Keeping all your earnings.
title: Learning Management System With Wordpress
